docs.snippet: The governor ordered an investigation after relatives said that older children pushed the boy off a picnic table with a rope around his neck.

headline.print_headline: Rope Wounds Of 8-Year-Old Mark Possible Hate Crime
headline.main: New Hampshire Investigates Wounding of 8-Year-Old as Possible Hate Crime

docs.snippet: Mr. May was in residence at Harrah’s casino in Las Vegas when he suffered cardiac arrest. He toured widely and was seen in Netflix specials.

headline.print_headline: Ralphie May, 45, Brash and Large Comic
headline.main: Ralphie May, 45, Comedian ‘Who Happens to Be Fat,’ Dies

docs.snippet: After years of relying on a no-frills lobbying operation, Amazon is spreading its message far and wide in the nation’s capital.

headline.print_headline: Amazon Lobbyists Ramp Up Their Charm Offensive in D.C.
headline.main: Amazon Turns on the Charm Amid Criticism From Right and Left

docs.snippet: Stephen K. Bannon has agreed to speak this month at the invitation of a conservative student publication at the University of California, Berkeley.

headline.main: Bannon Will Address Berkeley, a Hotbed of Conflict Over Free Speech

docs.snippet: Jacqueline Spagnola and Guido Wolff lived an ocean apart, but fell in love during a weeklong yachting trip — on different boats.

headline.print_headline: They Found the Harbor for Their Hearts
headline.main: They Found the Harbor for Their Hearts

docs.snippet: An exhibition was abruptly shut down after protests, including some from those who demanded the impeachment of Brazil’s president last year.

headline.print_headline: Brazilian Art Show Sets Off Dispute That Mirrors Politics
headline.main: Brazilian Art Show Sets Off Dispute That Mirrors Political Battles

docs.snippet: Tribalism based on race, religion, sexual identity and place of birth has replaced inclusive nationalism.

headline.print_headline: Americans must decide who they really are
headline.main: Bill Clinton: Americans Must Decide Who We Really Are

docs.snippet: Bitcoin and other virtual currencies are booming around the world. In South Korea, regular investors are leading the way for the global frenzy.

headline.print_headline: Koreans Rush In  On Bitcoin And Rivals
headline.main: In South Korea, the Virtual Currency Boom Hits Home

docs.snippet: Water and electricity have been cut off to a Papua New Guinea detainee camp, but hundreds of asylum seekers are refusing to let Australia move them.

headline.main: What Is Happening on Manus Island? The Detainee Crisis Explained

docs.snippet: While Julia Child was capturing France through its cuisine, it was that same French magic that inspired her husband, Paul, to capture the country through photography.
docs.abstract: While Julia Child was capturing France through its cuisine, it was that same French magic that inspired her husband, Paul, to capture the country through photography.
